channel.title: Video on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.description: This is one of the best movies about running I have seen in a while. Although I peaked at the half-marathon distance (21K), I do run for pretty much the reasons that motivate this guy to run 100 miles. I also fight the same daemons along the race, urging me to stop and quit all the time. One thing I learned during the 3 years of active running: Distance running is 20% physical and 80% mental fitness.
item.content:
This is one of the best movies about running I have seen in a while. Although I peaked at the half-marathon distance (21K), I do run for pretty much the reasons that motivate this guy to run 100 miles. I also fight the same daemons along the race, urging me to stop and quit all the time.

One thing I learned during the 3 years of active running:

Distance running is 20% physical and 80% mental fitness.
